overview: Ricochet provides a behind-the-scenes portrait of David Bowie during his 1983 Serious Moonlight Tour.  Filmed on location in Singapore, Bangkok and Hong Kong, this film includes live performances of “Fame,” “Look Back in Anger,” “Heroes” and “Ricochet.”  Ricochet was previously released to home video in 1984 in a shorter version, separately from the Serious Moonlight video. It was later reissued as an extra with the 2006 DVD reissue of Serious Moonlight.
title: Ricochet
